skill.name: Unlocking the Technician
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place a trip mine.

skill.name: Rifleman
skill.normal: Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with assault rifles and sniper rifles.
skill.ace: Your weapon zoom level is increased by 25% with assault rifles and sniper rifles. .

skill.name: Demolition Man
skill.normal: Adds 1 more trip mine to your inventory.
skill.ace: ecreases your trip mine deploy time by 20%.

skill.name: Nerves of Steel
skill.normal: You take 50% less damage while interacting with things.
skill.ace: You can now use steel sight while in bleedout.
